thread.title: Krispy Kreme Takes Chance on International Flavor
thread.title_full: Krispy Kreme Takes Chance on International Flavor - WSJ

author: Spencer Jakab
title: Krispy Kreme Takes Chance on International Flavor
text:
It is hard to sugarcoat things in Cambodia, Guatemala, Myanmar and Bangladesh…but not impossible.
Krispy Kreme Doughnuts Inc. is targeting those four countries, among others, in its furious international expansion. The fate of its existing international franchises will go a long way toward determining whether Wednesday’s report on fiscal second-quarter earnings leaves a sweet aftertaste. Over the past two years, the stock has...
